question.title: Will Elon Musk show up at the Bitcoin Nashville 2024?
question.body:
This market will resolve YES, if Elon Musk becomes a guest on the official stage of the Bitcoin Nashville 2024, one of the largest Bitcoin conferences, taking place on July 25-27, 2024.

[image]

Q.title: Will Elon Musk make a public statement about Bitcoin during 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve YES if Elon Musk makes a public statement regarding Bitcoin at any event or through any media platform during the year 2024.

P_given_Q.body: This question will resolve YES if Elon Musk makes a public statement regarding Bitcoin at any event or through any media platform during the year 2024. Additionally, this market will resolve YES if Elon Musk becomes a guest on the official stage of the Bitcoin Nashville 2024, one of the largest Bitcoin conferences, taking place on July 25-27, 2024.

question.title: Will Elon Musk not show up at the Bitcoin Nashville 2024?
question.body:
This market will resolve YES, if Elon Musk does not become a guest on the official stage of the Bitcoin Nashville 2024, one of the largest Bitcoin conferences, taking place on July 25-27, 2024.

Q.title: Will Elon Musk make a surprise appearance at any major cryptocurrency event in 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve YES if Elon Musk is confirmed to appear unexpectedly at any significant cryptocurrency-related event in 2024, regardless of the event's location or focus.

P_given_Q.title: Given Elon Musk makes a surprise appearance at any major cryptocurrency event in 2024, will he not show up at the Bitcoin Nashville 2024?
P_given_Q.body:
This question will resolve YES if Elon Musk is confirmed to appear unexpectedly at any significant cryptocurrency-related event in 2024, regardless of the event's location or focus. This market will resolve YES, if Elon Musk does not become a guest on the official stage of the Bitcoin Nashville 2024, one of the largest Bitcoin conferences, taking place on July 25-27, 2024.

Resolution criteria: 
- For P: Elon Musk must be confirmed to appear unexpectedly at any significant cryptocurrency-related event in 2024.
- For Q: Elon Musk must not become a guest on the official stage of the Bitcoin Nashville 2024.

Q.title: Will Elon Musk publicly comment on Bitcoin before the Nashville conference in 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve YES if Elon Musk makes a public statement about Bitcoin in any form (social media, interviews, etc.) before July 25, 2024.

P_given_Q.title: Given that Elon Musk publicly comments on Bitcoin before the Nashville conference in 2024, will Elon Musk not show up at the Bitcoin Nashville 2024?
P_given_Q.body:
Suppose the following is true: Elon Musk makes a public statement about Bitcoin in any form (social media, interviews, etc.) before July 25, 2024. Then will Elon Musk not become a guest on the official stage of the Bitcoin Nashville 2024, one of the largest Bitcoin conferences, taking place on July 25-27, 2024? 

Resolution criteria for P: Resolves YES if Elon Musk makes a public statement about Bitcoin in any form before July 25, 2024.
Resolution criteria for Q: Resolves YES if Elon Musk does not become a guest on the official stage of the Bitcoin Nashville 2024.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given Elon Musk does not publicly comment on Bitcoin before the Nashville conference in 2024, will he not show up at the Bitcoin Nashville 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body:
This question will resolve YES if Elon Musk does not make a public statement about Bitcoin in any form (social media, interviews, etc.) before July 25, 2024. Additionally, this market will resolve YES, if Elon Musk does not become a guest on the official stage of the Bitcoin Nashville 2024, one of the largest Bitcoin conferences, taking place on July 25-27, 2024.

Resolution criteria: 1. Elon Musk does not publicly comment on Bitcoin before July 25, 2024. 2. Elon Musk does not become a guest on the official stage of the Bitcoin Nashville 2024.
